snippet: California finds High Desert State Prison to be overcrowded, governed by “oblivious” officials, and run by guards through violence and racism.
abstract: California inspector general report on High Desert State Prison lends further support to California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation changes implemented to address ongoing abuse and discrimination against Latino and black inmates at facility.
lead_paragraph: California finds High Desert State Prison to be overcrowded, governed by “oblivious” officials, and run by guards through violence and racism.

headline.main: California Rebukes Rural Prison for Racism
headline.print_headline: State Rebukes Rural Prison for Racism
